scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the cross in the center. He is shown with a halo and a loincloth, bleeding from his wounds. To the left, the Virgin Mary, dressed in blue, is shown with her hands clasped in prayer, accompanied by another figure in red. To the right, a Roman soldier in armor and a helmet stands next to a figure in green, possibly John the Evangelist. The ground is depicted as a rocky, uneven terrain with skulls scattered around, symbolizing Golgotha. The background is a rich, red tapestry with intricate gold ornamentation. The entire scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
